name: olio.state
label: State
description: This model represents the state of an entity in a realm, including its current event, location, actions, and various status flags. It is used to track the condition and activities of entities such as players or NPCs within the game world.

fields.name: agitated
fields.description: Bit indicating that the state was intentionally agitated

fields.name: playerControlled
fields.description: When true, the character is controlled by a player and excluded from automatic evolution

fields.name: hunger
fields.description: Hunger level (0 = sated, 1 = starving). Accumulates per increment, reduced by consuming food.

fields.name: thirst
fields.description: Thirst level (0 = hydrated, 1 = parched). Accumulates per increment, reduced by consuming water.

fields.name: fatigue
fields.description: Fatigue level (0 = rested, 1 = exhausted). Accumulates with actions and wakefulness, reduced by sleep.

fields.name: currentEast
fields.description: Meters from the western grid line of the currentLocation

fields.name: currentNorth
fields.description: Meters from the northern grid line of the currentLocation

fields.name: health
fields.description: Percentage of health remaining (1.0 = full health)

fields.name: energy
fields.description: Percentage of energy remaining (1.0 = full energy)
